title: Software & Hardware
description: Coding, hacking, research prototypes, interactive systems...

items.title: Opportunity Mapper
items.description: Web app to calculate Opportunity Scores and Map

items.title: Lockdown
items.description: An interactive videoclip for Spacebarman's song Lockdown. Built with WebVR/WebXR (i.e. browser-based), but best experienced with an Oculus Quest

items.title: BLESync
items.description: A Bluetooth device for synchronizing tap-tempo pedals to computer DAWs

items.title: MagicScroll
items.description: A rollable display device with flexible screen area and gestural input. I designed and coded a dual-browser, dual-device software interface for this device

items.title: ReFlex
items.description: World's first self-contained flexible smartphone. I designed the haptic engine and collaborated on the R&D behind this experimental device

items.title: Haptics on Cylindrical Displays
items.description: Effects of Tactile Feedback on the Perception of Virtual Shapes on Non-Planar DisplayObjects. I designed the experimental device, software, haptic feedback, and study for this research project

items.title: An Evaluation of Shape Changes for Conveying Emotions
items.description: Is it possible to recognize emotions from dynamic shape changes? This project explores this idea when applied to an hypothetical flexible phone

items.title: Multitouch Interface for Audio Mixing
items.description: A digital prototype and study aimed at challenging traditional audio mixer design using a multitouch interface

items.title: AR Wall
items.description: An interactive customer wall that uses augmented reality wall to communicate the results of a UX study conducted at Microsoft

items.title: HCI/UX Research Portfolio
items.description: A portfolio with a selection of Human-Computer Interaction and User Experience research projects (PDF download, last updated in mid-2021)

items.title: BlueMO
items.description: BlueMO is a Bluetooth LE to MIDI/OSC translator for Mac OS X

items.title: Macbook trackpad as controller for Ableton Live
items.description: Max for Live device for using a Macbook trackpad as an Ableton Live controller

items.title: Random as control
items.description: A simple experiment on using dice-rolling (a familiar example of randomness) as a control source

items.title: Augmented guitar
items.description: My take on the old theme of augmenting electric guitars with electronics

items.title: Bicing Spider
items.description: An experiment on Web data scraping and interactive visualization using Quartz Composer
